b.`question_id` questionId, question_type questionType, question_name questionName, question_difficulty questionDifficulty, question_answer questionAnswer, question_option questionOption, question_flag questionFlag, DATE_FORMAT(question_createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") questionCreateTime, question_effective questionEffective, question_chater questionChater, question_score questionScore,question_photo questionPhoto
mapper.insert: insert into online_questions (question_id, question_type, question_name, question_difficulty, question_answer, question_option, question_flag, question_createTime, question_effective, question_chater, question_score,question_photo) values (#{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionDifficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionOption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, now(), '1', #{questionChater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{questionPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update online_questions
question_type = #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question_name = #{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_difficulty = #{questionDifficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_answer = #{questionAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_option = #{questionOption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_flag = #{questionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
question_createTime = #{questionCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
question_effective = #{questionEffective,jdbcType=BIT},
question_chater = #{questionChater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question_score = #{questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question_photo = #{questionPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update online_questions set question_type = #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question_name = #{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question_difficulty = #{questionDifficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question_answer = #{questionAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question_option = #{questionOption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question_flag = #{questionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, question_createTime = #{questionCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, question_effective = #{questionEffective,jdbcType=BIT}, question_chater = #{questionChater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question_score = #{questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question_photo = #{questionPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from online_questions WHERE question_type = 1 ORDER BY `question_id` limit #{0}, #{1}
